1. Today’s Nintendo Direct Was A Damning Display Of The State Of Switch 2  Kotaku
  2. Nintendo just proved the Switch 2’s value in a huge way  Polygon
  3. 10 Months Later and the Switch 2 Still Hasn’t Proven Its Worth  ComicBook.com
  4. Nintendo Switch 2 Outperforms Switch In Key Tests  findarticles.com
  5. Perhaps I was too harsh on you, Nintendo – the Switch 2 left me surprised, and now's the best time to buy  TechRadar
